steps.title: Navigate to and right-click your file.
steps.content: Navigate to and right-click your file. A menu will drop-down from your cursor. This method works for both Windows and Mac computers, although the program titles may differ.

steps.title: Click Open With.
steps.content: Click Open With . Another menu will appear that lists all compatible programs, including Paint and Preview.

steps.title: Click Paint or Preview.
steps.content: Click Paint or Preview . Your image file will open in either of these programs. You can also choose to search the store for more compatible apps, which is usually the last item on the list.

steps.title: Open My Files (Android) or Files (iOS).
steps.content: Open My Files (Android) or Files (iOS). The wording of the appâ€™s name may vary depending on the software version you are using.

steps.title: Navigate to and tap on your file.
steps.content: Navigate to and tap on your file. You are first directed to the top of the tree, or the main folder of your local storage. When you tap on a folder name, you are directed into that folder.

steps.title: Your image file will open in the default image app.
steps.content: Your image file will open in the default image app. For example, your image file can open in Photos, the default image app for iOS.
